column1: The Purple Pig////Absolutely amazing.  We went here because of the strong reviews and we were not disappointed. Every menu item was fantastic and unique. King crab
column7: whipped feta - all were fantastic.  Service was timely and informative. Lively atmosphere but not overwhelming.  The only drawback is the setting walking into what appears to be a business center but once inside you might as well be right on the Mile.  A member of our party said it was the best meal she's ever had!  It is that good.
